original: COLLIN, Nils Wilhelm, Köpman, Norrköping, f Norrkpg 20/10 90 av färgaren J C o h h, f Olsson, gm Edith Blid. Efter avslutad skolgång anst Svante Danielssons Speceriaffär, Norrkp, 03—06, i Engberg & Johnzons Kolo-nialvarufma, Norrkp, 06 o som bokf o försälj där 13—20, huvudbokf i I Ringborgs AB 20— 21, ink- o försäljn.chef h I Engbergs Kolonial-varu AB 21—28. Chef f Gevaliarosteriet o AB Carl P Påhlssons Nederlag i Norrkp sed. 38. Medl av Norrkps Kaffe- o Kolonialvaruimp.-frn samt dess sekr 22—$8, medl av Norrkps Köpm.frb o vice ordf i Sockerengrosfrn, medl av Sällsk V G B samt dess rev, Odd Fellow.
translated: COLLIN, Nils Wilhelm, Merchant, Norrköping, b. Norrköping 20/10 90 to the dyer J C and h h, b. Olsson, m. Edith Blid. After completing his education, he was employed at Svante Danielsson's Grocery Store, Norrköping, 03-06, at Engberg & Johnzon's Colonial Goods Store, Norrköping, 06 and as an accountant and salesperson there 13-20, head accountant at I Ringborgs AB 20-21, purchasing and sales manager at Engbergs Colonial Goods AB 21-28. Became manager of Gevalia Coffee Roastery and AB Carl P Påhlsson's Depot in Norrköping since 38. Member of Norrköping's Coffee and Colonial Goods Importers Association and its secretary 22-28, member of Norrköping's Merchants Association and vice chairman of the Sugar Wholesale Importers Association, member of the Society V G B and its board, Odd Fellow.

structured.name: Nils Wilhelm Collin

employmentHistory.name: Gevaliarosteriet o AB Carl P Påhlssons Nederlag

structured.description: Nils Wilhelm Collin was a Swedish merchant born on October 20, 1890, in Norrköping. He was the son of J C and h h Olsson and married Edith Blid. After completing his education, he worked at various organizations, including Svante Danielssons Speceriaffär and Engberg & Johnzons Kolo-nialvarufma. From 1921 to 1928, he held the position of purchasing and sales manager at Engbergs Kolonial-varu AB. In 1938, he became the manager of Gevaliarosteriet o AB Carl P Påhlssons Nederlag. Nils Wilhelm Collin was involved in several associations such as Norrkps Kaffe- o Kolonialvaruimp.-frn, Norrkps Köpm.frb, Sockerengrosfrn, Sällsk V G B, and Odd Fellow.

career.workplace: Gevaliarosteriet o AB Carl P Påhlssons Nederlag
